message: What the fuck about this is entertaining?!

name: ウイルス
message: "Does anyone truly have the right to say who is sane and who is not?"

name: ウイルス
message: "I, at least, can say that we are normal. From our perspective, that is."

name: ウイルス
message: "If a stranger looked at you, they might think you were insane. What proof do you have that you aren't?"

name: ウイルス
message: "You simply believe that your behavior is normal. You believe that you aren't insane."

name: ウイルス
message: "Now, it's about time we wrap this up, don't you think? ...Do it."
